public class SimpleContentFilter
extends Object
implements ContentFilter

basic implementation of ContentFilter.

Nested Class Summary
static class SimpleContentFilter.FeatureClasses
          this implementation of ContentFilter is preset to accept only FeatureClass objects.

          this implementation of ContentFilter is preset to accept only Geocoder objects.

          this implementation of ContentFilter is preset to accept only Image objects.

          this implementation of ContentFilter is preset to accept only Layer objects.
static class SimpleContentFilter.Tables
          this implementation of ContentFilter is preset to accept only Table objects.

Constructor Detail

SimpleContentFilter

public SimpleContentFilter()
constructs a new ContentFilter that does not accept any Content types by default. Normally, you need to call addContentType one or more times to register Content types that will be accepted by the filter

SimpleContentFilter

public SimpleContentFilter(String type)
constructs a simple ContentFilter with a single initial acceptable Content-type that has default (empty) description

addContentType

public void addContentType(String type)
adds an acceptable Content-type that has default (empty) description. A Content-type is the full path name of a Java class.

Parameters:
type - the acceptable Content-type

addContentType

public void addContentType(String type,
                           String description)
adds an acceptable Content-type with given description. A Content-type is the full path name of a Java class.

Parameters:
type - the acceptable Content-type
description - a short description that may be shown in a user interface

Description copied from interface: ContentFilter
Tests whether or not the specified Content should be shown in a ContentChooser

Specified by:
accept in interface ContentFilter
Parameters:
content - the abstract Content to be tested
Returns:
true if content should be included, false == otherwise
